name: linux-pam
comment: This package is dual licensed under GPL-1.0-or-later or BSD-3-Clause. To facilitate automatic use, a default license choice of BSD-3-Clause is denoted in the Acknowledgment section of the OSS and OSSelot disclosure documents. This shall not restrict the freedom of users to choose either GPL-1.0-or-later or BSD-3-Clause. In case you want to use the package under GPL-1.0-or-later you need to modify the license choice accordingly. Anyway, all license texts are provided.
